## Requirement - what kind of business use case are you trying to solve?
Remove unnecessary duplicate metric.

## Problem - what in Jaeger blocks you from solving the requirement?
It appears that the collector is reporting two different metrics for the same situation.

If a span [cannot be added to the queue](https://github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/blob/3fd06773acb7d8adc2d1dddda93d8b7b8c6594d1/cmd/collector/app/span_processor.go#L142) the `ErrorBusy` counter is incremented.

However, the queue is also configured with a [dropped item handler](https://github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/blob/3fd06773acb7d8adc2d1dddda93d8b7b8c6594d1/cmd/collector/app/span_processor.go#L70-L73) which increments the `SpansDropped` counter.


## Proposal - what do you suggest to solve the problem or improve the existing situation?

Remove the `ErrorBusy` counter, as the `SpansDropped` is more explicit in terms of what it represents.

title: Duplicate metric "errors.busy" and "spans.dropped"
